The game crashes for me after a couple of minutes of playing. Any help?

if you have any sound problems just enable console, press ~ (usually above the tab key) to open it, then type in snd_rebuildaudiocache. wait for it to load completely then press ctrl+alt+delete to open task manager and end the process called left4dead.exe. hope this helps. :)
